Txt_Talk_Common_MAIN_0_SCENE_0010_010_1.Text: It suddenly feels like a good time to go and see how {MERCHANT} is getting on...

Txt_Talk_Common_Rainbow_Bridge_FieldEven.Text: You're going to need some extra help to reach the other side.

Txt_Talk_Common_TREASURE_9.Text: Uh-oh! The treasure chest is actually <IndefSgl_WORD>!

Txt_Talk_Common_BAG_1.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_LEADER> takes a quick look inside the bag.

Txt_Talk_Common_Fireplace_1.Text: A cosy-looking fire burns merrily away.

Txt_Talk_Common_Well_1.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_LEADER> takes a look down the well.

Txt_Talk_Common_Ozabuton_1.Text: It's all soft and fluffy. Apparently, this cushion-like object is called a zabuton.

Txt_Talk_Common_Shield_1.Text: A shield hangs decoratively from the wall.

Txt_Talk_Common_Spear_2.Text: A spear hangs decoratively from the wall.

Txt_Talk_Common_Axe_1.Text: An axe hangs decoratively from the wall.

Txt_Talk_Common_Sword_1.Text: A sword hangs decoratively from the wall.

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_3.Text: <IfGender_LEADER(He is,She is,They are)> relieved to see that <IfGender_LEADER(he's,she's,they're)> just as good-looking as <IfGender_LEADER(he remembers,she remembers,they remember)>!

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_4.Text: He's reassured to see a ruggedly handsome face staring back.

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_5.Text: <IfGender_LEADER(He,She,They)> seems to have grown a little tougher-looking recently.

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_6.Text: A fresh, lively face smiles back.

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_7.Text: <IfGender_LEADER(His,Her,Their)> hair is out of place, so <IfGender_LEADER(he takes,she takes,they take)> a moment to put it back in order.

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_8.Text: And breaks out into a huge grin!

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_9.Text: And tries making a really haughty face for fun!

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_10.Text: {LEADER}! What are you doing? Come on, let's get going!

Txt_Talk_Common_Mirror_11.Text: A fun-loving face smiles cheekily back!

Txt_Talk_Common_LockedDoor_2.Text:
The door is locked.
Only the right key will open it.

Txt_Talk_Common_Yggdrasil_1.Text: {LEADER} closely examines each branch of the tree before <IfGender_LEADER(him,her,them)>...

Txt_Talk_Common_Yggdrasil_2.Text: But it appears to be completely leafless.

Txt_Talk_Common_Corpse_1.Text:
No reply.
It's just a corpse.

Txt_Talk_Common_Lancel_1.Text:
{LEADER} tries to talk to <DefSgl_WORD>...
But there's no answer.

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_3.Text:
*: You wot!? 'Oo d'you fink yer<--->
'Ang about! There's no one there!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_4.Text: *: Hm? I could have sworn I heard something...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_5.Text:
Wh<--->!? Who's there?
Show yourself!
I command you!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_8.Text:
*: Oh, beloved Goddess!
Holy Mother! Is it really You?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_9.Text:
*: Hm? Who's there? ...Oh.
I need to get some sleep...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_10.Text:
*: Who's there!? Hmm...
Must be the wind...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_11.Text:
*: Who is there? Show yourself!
Come out and face me!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_14.Text: *: Hmm... Perhaps I am imagining things...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_16.Text:
*: ♪ Ohhh, the bard turned to stare,
But nobody was theeeeeere,
La, la-la, la, la-la, leee! ♪

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_17.Text: *: That's strange. I could have sworn somebody was trying to talk to me just then...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_18.Text: *: Gah, now I'm hearing things? Been locked up in this place for too long...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_21.Text: *: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can see you!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_22.Text:
*: A strange sensation...
Do the spirits speak to me...?
Or is it the wind...?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_23.Text:
*: Whispers on the breeze...
Leaves rustle, though no wind blows...
What magic is this...?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_24.Text: *: Yikes! I-Is it you, brother? Or is it one of my poor sisters...? Why are you not in heaven!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_25.Text: *: I heard a voice. I am sure of this. I do not lie! ...Unless the ague is upon me again?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_26.Text: *: Hm? Somebody spoke. But who? More thieves come to take what little we have left?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_27.Text:
*: I cannot see you, but I feel you.
Who is there? ...Is it you, Death?
Well, I am ready...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_29.Text: *: Eek! Where did that voice come from!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_30.Text: *: What's that? Did somebody say something?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_32.Text: *: Eek! Who's there? What is the meaning of this!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_33.Text:
*: .........That's strange.
Are my ears playing up?
Or maybe it's my eyes...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_34.Text:
*: How very odd...
I could have sworn I heard somebody speaking, but... Hm.

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_35.Text:
Hello?
Who is there?
Do not hide!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_39.Text:
*: That's weird...
I need to get my ears looked at...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_40.Text:
I sense a presence...
There is someone there...
Speak to me...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_41.Text:
Arr, is that the spirits a-talkin' to me?
Belay there, ye scurvy devils!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_42.Text:
*: Voices from nowhere...
Floating from another realm...?
Or within my heart...?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_43.Text: *: I heard something. But nobody is there. (sigh) Just the ague playing tricks on my mind, no doubt...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_44.Text: *: What was that? Who spoke? The ghost of one of my children, perhaps? Abram? Jacob? ...Martha, Ruth or Hannah?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_46.Text: Can I, of all people, truly be hearing voices?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_47.Text:
Is somebody there...?
Do spirits walk among us...?
Silence, foul spectres!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_48.Text: *: Praise be! Did the great Goddess Herself just speak to me!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_49.Text: Welcome to Patty's Party Planning Place! If you want to pick up party mem<--->

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_50.Text: Huh? But...? I could have sworn there was somebody there...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_51.Text: (sigh) I wonder what my little one is doing right now...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_55.Text: *: ...Playing tricks on spirits now, are you?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_56.Text:
You think I don't see you?
Think again, human!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_60.Text:
.........That's strange.
Are my ears playing up?
Or maybe it's my eyes...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_61.Text: Hm? I could have sworn I heard something...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_62.Text: Gah, now I'm 'earin' fings? Been locked up in this place for too long...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_64.Text:
That's weird...
I need to get my ears looked at...

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_66.Text: Eek! Where did that voice come from!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_68.Text:
Voices from nowhere...
Floating from another realm...?
Or within my heart...?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_70.Text:
A strange sensation...
Do the spirits speak to me...?
Or is it the wind...?

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_73.Text:
♪ Ohhh, the bard turned to stare,
But nobody was theeeeeere,
La, la-la, la, la-la, leee! ♪

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_74.Text:
You think I don't see you?
Think again, human!

Txt_Talk_Common_Kiesari_75.Text:
Wh<--->!? Who's there?
Show yourself!
I command you!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_1.Text: *: What are you supposed to be?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_5.Text:
What is the meaning of this!?
Who allowed <IfSolo(a monster,monsters)> into our midst!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_6.Text:
*: Arrrgh!
Spare me! I beg you!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_7.Text: *: Leave this place, foul fiend<IfSolo(,s)>, or suffer divine retribution!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_8.Text: *: I say! <IfSolo(A monster,A group of monsters)>! If I could only capture <IfSolo(it,them)>, I could use <IfSolo(it,them)> to advance my research...

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_9.Text:
*: What's this!? Grr! Come on, then!
Let's see what you've got!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_10.Text:
*: Curse you, foul fiend<IfSolo(,s)>!
Begone, or feel my wrath!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_11.Text:
*: Where the heck did you come from?
Grrr! Come and have a go if you think you're hard enough!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_12.Text: *: You want to fight? Fight me! Haaaaaai-YAH!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_14.Text:
*: ♪ Oh, the bard spies <IfSolo(a beeeast,beeeasts)>,
He's not scared in the leeeast! ♪
Ulp... Yes he is! Heeelp!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_15.Text: *: <IfSolo(A monster,Monsters)>? <IfSolo(What's a monster,What are monsters)> doing in a place like this?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_16.Text:
*: <IfSolo(M-M-M-Monsterrrrrr,M-M-M-Monsterrrrrrs)>!
Somebody save me!
I'll go straight, I promise!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_17.Text: *: Arrr! Well, beastie<IfSolo(,s)>? D'ye mean to fight me, or merely flap yer foul tongue<IfSolo(,s)>? En garde!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_19.Text: *: What are you doing going around looking like that?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_21.Text:
*: A monster appears...
Malice in a place of peace...
A short, sharp scream: EEEK!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_22.Text:
*: Wh-What are you?
Are you...<IfSolo(a monster,monsters)>?
...Or have I caught the ague?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_24.Text: *: <IfSolo(An evil spirit visits,Evil spirits visit)> us! Someone send word to the witchfinder before it is too late!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_25.Text: *: O Goddess<--->was the famine not enough? And what of the ague!? Must we be visited, too, by foul beasts!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_26.Text: *: Eeek! <IfSolo(A monster,Monsters)>! Has the Goddess sent you to punish me for forgetting to say my prayers?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_27.Text:
*: EEEK!!! <IfSolo( IT'S A MONSTER,MONSTERS)>!!!
Help meee!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_29.Text:
*: Don't you dare!
This place is for humans only!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_30.Text: *: D-Don't eat me! I'll be all tough and chewy, anyway! You won't enjoy me one bit!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_31.Text:
*: Wh-What is the meaning of this!?
Guards! Somebody!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_35.Text:
This is no place for the likes of you!
Begone!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_36.Text: Belay there, scurvy beastie<IfSolo(,s)>! D'ye not know where ye are? 'Tis a den of bloodthirsty brigands ye've wandered into!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_37.Text:
*: A merciless beast...
Fearful, the girl screams for aid...
Shrill, like the gull: EEEK!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_38.Text: *: Do your worst, demon<IfSolo(,s)>! There is no suffering in the next world!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_39.Text: *: O Goddess! Save us from the evil spirit<IfSolo(,s)>, and we shall work harder than ever to please You, come fever or famine!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_40.Text: Guards! Guards! What is the meaning of this!? Get <IfSolo(this creature,these creatures)> out of my sight!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_41.Text:
A creature appears...
Expecting the lady's screams...
She laughs instead... Ha!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_42.Text: *: Oh, Goddess! Oh Holy Mother! Spare this humble servant of Yours death at the hands of <IfSolo(a monster,monsters)>!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_43.Text: What do you think you're doing!? Don't you know this place is rammed to the rafters with bloodthirsty adventurers?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_44.Text: H-Help! Ortega, where are you when I need you!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_48.Text:
*: Oh look. <IfSolo(A monster,Monsters)>.
What are you going to do, kill me?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_49.Text:
You think you can fool us, looking like that?
Not a chance, human<IfSolo(,s)>!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_51.Text:
Arrrgh!
Spare me! I beg you!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_53.Text: D-Don't eat me! I'll be all tough and chewy, anyway! You won't enjoy me one bit!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_55.Text:
<IfSolo(M-M-M-Monsterrrrrr,M-M-M-Monsterrrrrrs)>!
Somebody save me!
I'll go straight, I promise!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_59.Text: What are you doing going around looking like that?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_60.Text:
EEEK!!! <IfSolo( IT'S A MONSTER,MONSTERS)>!!!
Help meee!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_62.Text:
A merciless beast...
Fearful, the girl screams for aid...
Shrill, like the gull: EEEK!!!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_65.Text: I ain't scared of no monsters. Come on, then! You 'ardly came 'ere to talk now, did ya?

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_66.Text:
♪ Oh, the bard spies <IfSolo(a beeeast,beeeasts)>,
He's not scared in the leeeast! ♪
Ulp... Yes he is! Heeelp!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_67.Text:
You think you can fool us, looking like that?
Not a chance, human<IfSolo(,s)>!

Txt_Talk_Common_Monster_68.Text:
What is the meaning of this!?
Who allowed <IfSolo(a monster,monsters)> into our midst!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_2.Text:
*: Ha! <IfSolo(A slime,Slimes)>! Begone, foul creature<IfSolo(,s)>!
Shoo!

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_3.Text: *: <IfSolo(A slime,Slimes)>! I have heard of you, but never seen one of your kind. Well, Mother always said I would die young...

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_4.Text: *: <IfSolo(A slime,Slimes)>! What on earth <IfSolo(is a slime,are slimes)> doing here!?

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_6.Text: *: What<IfSolo('s a lovely little slime, are lovely little slimes)> like you doing here, hm? Are you lost? Poor thing<IfSolo(,s)>...

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_7.Text: Hello there, little fellow<IfSolo(,s)>! Welcome to Patty's Place! I'm sorry, but we don't cater to slimes here...

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_8.Text: *: (slurp sluuurp) Do you come here often?

Txt_Talk_Common_Slime_10.Text: (slurp sluuurp) Do you come here often?

Txt_Talk_Common_ZomaBattle_1.Text: Hm hm hm! So you have learned how to overcome the wards of sorcery that protect me?

Txt_Talk_Common_ZomaBattle_2.Text: It matters not. Come! Dash yourselves on the unfeeling shoals of my might!

Txt_Talk_Common_Field_MAIN_0_SCENE_0030_.Text: A thunderous rumbling echoes from the skies above. It almost sounds like a giant door slamming shut...

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Escape_Sound.Text: The monster is startled by the sound of your footsteps and flees!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Escape_Smell.Text: The monster sniffs your considerable scent and flees!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Escape_Look.Text: The monster notices you approaching and flees!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Entry_1.Text:
*: Welcome to our most hallowed arena, where the world's friendliest<--->yet also mightiest<--->monsters engage in glorious combat!<KEY_WAIT>
*: You're currently able to compete in the rank<---> Oh? Sorry, {LEADER}, but it seems you're not qualified to test your monsters' might here.

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Entry_2.Text: *: According to our records, you haven't triumphed in all the available tournaments at the arena in Romaria yet. Do come back when you've beaten all those. Best of luck now!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Entry_3.Text: *: According to our records, you haven't triumphed in all the available tournaments at the arena in Ibis yet. Do come back when you've beaten all those. Best of luck now!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Entry_4.Text: *: According to our records, you haven't triumphed in all the available tournaments at the arena in Manoza yet. Do come back when you've beaten all those. Best of luck now!

Txt_Talk_Common_MBR_Entry_5.Text: *: According to our records, you haven't triumphed in all the available tournaments at the arena in Cantlin yet. Do come back when you've beaten all those. Best of luck now!

Txt_Talk_Common_Field_SignBoard_5.Text:
Ahead: The Desert
South-West: Ibis
West: The Great Pyramid

Txt_Talk_Common_Field_SignBoard_8.Text:
North: Tower of Transcendence

South-East: Wayfarer's Inn

Txt_Talk_Common_Field_SignBoard_11.Text:
↑ Persistence (Up the River)

← Fifer's Spire (Over the Western Mountains)

Txt_Talk_Common_shortcut_1.Text: It seems you can go directly to the starting point of the area from here. Do you want to go?
